name: digital-toolkit
description: SAS Digital Toolkit Dashboard - A Google Apps Script web application for managing school application data

scripts.setup: npm install && cd vercel && npm install
scripts.supabase:link: cd vercel && npx supabase link --project-ref tsirdxnazadtztdsxqbp
scripts.supabase:migration:new: cd vercel && npx supabase migration new
scripts.supabase:db:push: cd vercel && npx supabase db push
scripts.supabase:db:pull: cd vercel && npx supabase db pull
scripts.mcp:setup:supabase: claude mcp add --scope project --transport http supabase "https://mcp.supabase.com/mcp?project_ref=tsirdxnazadtztdsxqbp"
scripts.mcp:setup:clasp: claude mcp add --scope project clasp -- npx @google/clasp mcp
